full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
======================================

**Project Title**
-----------------

VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE ( Request for Proposal )

**Request for Proposal Number**
------------------------------

RFx for the supply of VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE to the Department of National Defence

**Contracting Entity**
---------------------

* Director Maritime Procurement
* 101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2
* Canada

**Procurement Information**
-------------------------

* **Procurement Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement.

**Supply Requirements**
---------------------

The Department of National Defence is seeking bids for the supply of:

* Item 1: 10 VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE (Part No.: 8611539, NCAGE: 81576) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* Item 2: 7 VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE (Part No.: 8611539, NCAGE: 81576) to be delivered to CFB Halifax
* Item 3: 7 VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE (Part No.: 8611540, NCAGE: 81576) to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
* Item 4: 6 VALVE, REGULATING, FLUID PRESSURE (Part No.: 8611540, NCAGE: 81576) to be delivered to CFB Halifax

**Evaluation Criteria**
----------------------

The bids will be evaluated based on the Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Submission Requirements**
-------------------------

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

Interested bidders must access the solicitation documents on the Buy and Sell website at [https://canad
